title: How to get a religious exemption for the covid19 vaccine

summary: Covid19 vaccine - How to get a religious exemption to the covid19 vaccine.

17.en: Many of John's friends were proudly telling John that they just got the covid19 vaccine. But John had some concerns about it. John comes from a church that opposes abortion, the killing of innocent, unborn babies. So John decided to ask his doctor for his thoughts on the vaccine.

23.en: reaction may include anaphylactic symptoms including rashes, shortness of breath, rapid heartbeat, and a decrease in blood pressure. The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) recommends that people who have a known allergy to PEG should not get the Covid19 vaccine.

35.en: Pastor Robert: "I agree with you John. That is why no one in my family has taken the vaccine. I can prepare a letter like this one on the next page for you if you want."
